short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The ultimate universal wish list and source for gift giving inspiration. Add anything to your Gift Hero wish list with just a click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add an item from any online retailer to your Gift Hero wish lists. Now includes a link to your wish list after you add the item.
